name: SlidingMatch3
description:
It is my take on Match3 genre with some new twists.

In here you slide entire rows or columns to match 3,4,or 5 gems, and when you do they advance into next tier.

You have limited amount of moves to beat your score

If you match 4 or 5 you either get no movement cost or even get a bonus move.

Last tier of pieces do not get matched so game gets harder and harder.

Enjoy your Play!
